description:
This release uses the latest KDE Plasma 6.2.3 desktop environment and it's powered by Linux kernel 6.11.7.

The post CachyOS ISO Release for November Improves Support for AMD and NVIDIA Users appeared first on Linux Today.
title: CachyOS ISO Release for November Improves Support for AMD and NVIDIA Users

description:
The latest Niri release, v0.1.10, brings window moving, pointer options, input enhancements, and fixes to Wayland's scrollable-tiling compositor.

The post Niri 0.1.10: Interactive Window Moving, Tablet Mode Switch, and More appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Niri 0.1.10: Interactive Window Moving, Tablet Mode Switch, and More

description:
Less than a month after its previous 7.20 version, Calibre, a popular open-source ebook management tool, has just released version 7.21, which includes improvements and new features. Here they are.

The post Calibre 7.21 Adds Read Aloud with Sentence Tracking for EPUBs appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Calibre 7.21 Adds Read Aloud with Sentence Tracking for EPUBs

description:
Hyprland 0.45, a tiling Wayland compositor, has been released with smoother edges, bug fixes, and breaking changes to optimize your experience.

The post Hyprland 0.45: Smoother Rounding, New Configs, and Key Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Hyprland 0.45: Smoother Rounding, New Configs, and Key Fixes

description:
Kdenlive 24.08.3 open-source video editor addresses codec crashes, timeline bugs, and clip removal issues.

The post Kdenlive 24.08.3 Arrives with Subtitle and Timeline Stability Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Kdenlive 24.08.3 Arrives with Subtitle and Timeline Stability Fixes

description:
Sparky 2024.11 brings the latest Debian testing packages, Linux kernel 6.11, Midori 11.4, Thunderbird 128.4.0esr, and more.

The post Debian-Based Sparky Linux Releases Latest Semi-Rolling ISO Update appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Debian-Based Sparky Linux Releases Latest Semi-Rolling ISO Update

description:
Wine 9.21 debuts with advanced network support in DirectPlay, D3DX9 format boost, C++ compilation fixes, and I/O improvements.

The post Wine 9.21 Brings Enhanced DirectPlay Network Session Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Wine 9.21 Brings Enhanced DirectPlay Network Session Support

description:
In this article we discuss the recent release of of Debian 12.8 as the seventh ISO update to the latest Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm” operating system series.

The post Debian 12.8 “Bookworm” Released with 68 Bug Fixes and 50 Security Updates appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Debian 12.8 “Bookworm” Released with 68 Bug Fixes and 50 Security Updates

description:
The KDE Project released today KDE Frameworks 6.8 as a new monthly update to this collection of more than 70 add-on libraries to Qt providing commonly needed functionality for KDE applications and the KDE Plasma desktop.

The post KDE Frameworks 6.8 Adds Breeze Icons for Typst Files And Fixes Many Bugs appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Frameworks 6.8 Adds Breeze Icons for Typst Files And Fixes Many Bugs

description:
The UBports Foundation announced today the release and general availability of Ubuntu Touch OTA-6 as the sixth update to the Ubuntu Touch mobile operating system based on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.

The post Ubuntu Touch OTA-6 Rolls Out with Wireless Display Improvements, Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu Touch OTA-6 Rolls Out with Wireless Display Improvements, Bug Fixes
